word_mean: 酵母〔菌〕，酿母〔菌〕：对由出芽方式增殖(芽生孢子形成)的单细胞圆形霉菌的通称。有些酵母菌在一定环境条件下，可转入菌丝期
而其他酵母菌则始终保持单细胞性。完全的酵母菌属子囊菌纲(Ascomycetes)半子囊菌亚纲(Hemiascomycetes)内孢霉目(Endomycetales)
不完全酵母菌则属于半知菌纲(Deuteromycetes)丛梗孢目(Moniliales)隐球酵母科(Cryptococcaceae)。有几种酵母菌对人类有致病性

derivation.yuyuan_name: Old English, of Germanic origin; related to Dutch gist and German Gischt 'froth, yeast', from an Indo-European root shared by Greek zein 'to boil'

entry.def: Yeast is a kind of fungus which is used to make bread rise, and in making alcoholic drinks such as beer.

means.word_mean: 1. a commercial leavening agent containing yeast cells; used to raise the dough in making bread and for fermenting beer or whiskey
2. any of various single-celled fungi that reproduce asexually by budding or division
